*div1 type="summary"* *p*R. R. Royall to Austin, October 10, 1827. Plans for returning to Texas,*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Tuscumbia Ala*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="10-10-1827">Octr 10th 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir The *person_mentioned*Bearer */person_mentioned*affords me an opportunity of communicating with you by private hand which Renders its passage more certain. I have felt much anxiety about that *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*and still feel But the Last measure of Your *person_mentioned*Govt */person_mentioned*on the *person_mentioned*slave */person_mentioned*question totally forbids by mooveing there under existing circumstances Yet I will most certainly see that *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*again probably in about *date_mentioned n="10-10-1828">12*/date_mentioned* or *date_mentioned n="04-10-1829">18 months*/date_mentioned* from this if not Required sooner to attend to my *location_mentioned*Land claims*/location_mentioned* which If necessary you will please apprise me. I have a wish to make an establishment there of a *location_mentioned*stock pen*/location_mentioned* and probably will come prepared for the purpose and If so may make it a partial *location_mentioned*Residence */location_mentioned*and If the named objection should be Removed there is no *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*in which I would be contented to till the soil except that while *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*is Recollected by me.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Judge Ellis*/person_mentioned*' letter to his *person_mentioned*Lady */person_mentioned*dated in *date_mentioned n="10-xx-1827">Augt*/date_mentioned*. came to hand and before you receive this he will no doubt have departed for *location_mentioned*home*/location_mentioned* If not his *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*remains as usuall except *person_mentioned*Mrs. Ellis*/person_mentioned* has sold his *location_mentioned*Land */location_mentioned*and is Looking with much anxiety for his Return his Business Remains otherwise as he left it and his *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*generally well and much Restored since the Rect of his letter in feelings as they had become very uneasy I will close after asking you to be so good as to Honour me with some Information from that *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*such as may be of Interest and particularly Relative to my *location_mentioned*Land claim*/location_mentioned* which I left with you, what is Likely to be done with the *location_mentioned*old claims*/location_mentioned* and what necessary on my part how are the prospects of the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* generally etc It would give me great satisfaction as a matter of Interest and afford an additional pleasure from consideration of high Regard, present me to *person_mentioned*majr Herd*/person_mentioned* If with you, your *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*tell your *person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*I have two as pretty grey hounds as he ever saw pups of *person_mentioned*Doctr Robertson's slutt*/person_mentioned* which he had in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, and would send them If I knew the passage could be relyed upon, the *person_mentioned*old man */person_mentioned*(bearer) have known for some time by sight only.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*R. R. Royall */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col S. F Austin*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
